name: opencode-token-monitor
description: OpenCode plugin for monitoring token usage and ecosystem analytics
author: Antigravity Team

scripts.build: bun build ./plugin/index.ts --outfile=dist/plugin.js --target=bun --external=@opencode-ai/plugin --external=@opencode-ai/sdk && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --project tsconfig.json --outDir dist --noEmit false
